long_description: Protect your iPad mini in style with the fashion-friendly Speck FitFolio Case. This sleek cover features a protective padded case, soft microsuede interior and hard-shell cradle. Formfitting cradle secures your iPad mini while you're in cyberspace and when you have to move around in the real world. Quadruple-angle stand creates 4 viewing angles; there's one that's right for everything you do. When you're on the go, closing the Speck FitFolio Case is easy with its smooth-snap clasp.
short_description: Protect your iPad mini in style with the fashion-friendly Speck FitFolio Case. This sleek cover features a protective padded case, soft microsuede interior and hard-shell cradle.
